titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Florida State University football team for winning the 2014 Bowl Championship Series national championship.
A resolution congratulating the Florida State University football team for winning the 2014 Bowl Championship Series national championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Florida State University football team for winning the 2014 Bowl Championship Series national championship.
